con:restRequest.name: AddSurvey
con:restRequest.con:request: { "SurveyCode": "SURVEY_CODE-${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MMddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "SurveyDescription": "Std Survey for Survey Moment${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("MMddyyyyhhmmssmmm").format(new Date())}", "CategoryId": "${AddSurveyCategory#Response#$['CategoryId']}", "StoreAsPreferenceInd": "${Survey#StoreAsPreferenceInd}", "IsDefaultSurvey": "${Survey#IsDefaultSurvey}", "SurveyStartDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+4)}", "SurveyEndDate": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date()+15)}", "IntroductoryCaption": "${Survey#IntroductoryCaption}", "CompletionMessage": "${Survey#CompletionMessage}" }
